idea-plugin.name: Prism Pro Theme
idea-plugin.description:
Prism Pro Theme is a modern, vibrant theme pack for JetBrains IDEs loved by developers. It features both Dark and Light variants with carefully crafted colors for long coding sessions.

Themes Included

  • Prism Pro Dark - Deep purple-black backgrounds with neon accents (purple, cyan, green)
  • Prism Pro Light - Soft lavender tones with vibrant syntax colors

Color Palette

  • Keywords: Purple (#a277ff / #8338ec)
  • Functions: Cyan (#82e2ff / #2196f3)
  • Strings: Green (#61ffca / #00a67e)
  • Classes: Orange (#ffca85 / #f59e0b)
  • Constants: Pink (#f694ff / #c026d3)

Features

  • Full UI coverage - every component styled consistently
  • Comprehensive syntax highlighting for all languages
  • Git integration with custom diff and VCS colors
  • Optimized contrast for reduced eye strain

Compatibility

Works with IntelliJ IDEA, Android Studio, WebStorm, PyCharm, PhpStorm, GoLand, RubyMine, CLion, Rider, DataGrip, Fleet and all other JetBrains IDEs.
